name: sequenceNumber
description: Monotonically increasing sequence number for the message

name: currency
description: The currency of the price (e.g., USD, EUR)

name: venue
description: The exchange or venue where the price originated

name: timestamp
description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the price was generated

name: bidOffer
description: Indicates if the price is a bid or an offer

name: quantity
description: The quantity available at this price
